## Tile.localTangentSpace property

Whether the data of this tile is in local tangent space or not. If the data is in local tangent space (i.e. up vector is (0,0,1) for high zoomlevels) then \[\[MapView\]\] will rotate the objects before rendering using the rotation matrix of the oriented \[\[boundingBox\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get localTangentSpace(): boolean;
```
